Responsibilities: Responsibilities of Customer Service and Sales Executives:
- Outbound and inbound call management: Making calls to potential customers and receiving calls from interested customers.
- Providing product and service information: Clearly and professionally explaining the company's products and services to customers.
- Lead follow-up and sales conversion: Maintaining regular communication with potential leads and converting them into permanent customers.
- Data management and reporting: Updating daily work tasks and accurately storing customer information on Google Sheets or CRM.
- Providing answers to inquiries: Resolving any customer questions or doubts and assisting with accurate information.
- Achieving sales targets: Meeting the company's defined daily, weekly, and monthly sales targets.
- Maintaining customer support and relationships: Ensuring post-sales services are provided and building long-term business relationships.
- Team coordination: Coordinating with other departments for the smooth running of tasks.
- Participation in training: Attending regular training sessions to learn about products, services, and sales skills.

Courier and Delivery Management:
- Order processing and booking: Booking orders correctly on the courier portal after ensuring customer's order confirmation.
- Delivery tracking: Tracking the current location of the parcel in transit and providing regular updates to the customer.
- Return or parcel follow-up: Resolving any delivery issues or non-receipt of parcels by contacting the courier service and the customer.
- Cash on delivery (COD) coordination: Managing payment received from the courier and promptly resolving any payment-related issues.
- Parcel packing supervision: Ensuring products are packed correctly and sent through the appropriate courier service.

Requirements: Essential Qualifications and Skills (Requirements): HSC/Equivalent pass. Prior experience in tele sales or call center-related work preferred. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Strong mentality and self-confidence to achieve sales targets. Customer-centric attitude and problem-solving skills. Ability to learn quickly and work under pressure. Additional Skills (Good to Have): Presentation Skills. Problem-Solving Skills. Negotiation Skills. Time management and multitasking abilities. Proficiency in computer and CRM software usage. Experience in customer management through email and social media. Preference given to candidates with proficiency in communication in Bengali and English alongside other languages.
